description: Vertical padding inside the select field (top and bottom spacing between border and content).
name: --fkt-select-vertical-padding

description: Horizontal padding inside the select field (left and right spacing between border and content).
name: --fkt-select-horizontal-padding

description: Border color of the select in its normal (default) state.
name: --fkt-select-border-color

description: Border color of the select when it gets focused
name: --fkt-select-border-focus-color

description: Color of the label in its normal (default) state.
name: --fkt-select-label-color

description: Color of the label when it gets focused
name: --fkt-select-label-focus-color

description: Font size for select text and placeholder.
name: --fkt-select-font-size
